summary: Adds a player owned home in Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new home for the player in Riverwood.

What is so different about this mod compared to other player home mods?
Well, that\'s it. Its a home.
Not a crafting station, not a free loot area. Its a place to sleep without breaking the law or paying 5000gold.

You must find the key though.
Spoiler - Its on a barrel next to the inn.

The mod was made using the Creation Kit and the Realistic Lighting mod, but as you can see from the screenshots, works nicely with vanilla lighting too.

I want to give a special thanks to Mehrunes201, for giving me help with the creation kit.

You can download this from Steam if you prefer.
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11378]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11378[/url]
author: Maddo3
